reviewText: I purchased this video for my child, who plays traveling soccer. This video shows some drills, but teaches nothing as far as skills go. My kid didn't learn any technique! We've purchased other videos that were way more valuable in technique and drills.

ADVANCED SOCCER DRILLS captures some creative drills that beginners, intermediate, recreational and travel teams will enjoy. These popular soccer titles by Marty Schupak are also available on Amazon's Video On Demand program for as low as $2.99. Championship Soccer Drills Backyard Soccer Drills 34 Soccer Goalie Drills Soccer Shooting Drills Soccer Fast Footwork Drills Advanced Soccer Drills

Drop whatever you are doing and pick up ADVANCED SOCCER DRILLS. This complementary program fits in perfect with Marty Schupak's other soccer DVDs. Detailed soccer drills! This soccer DVD set is also popular with soccer coaches, leagues, and parents. Soccer Coaching:Schupak's Soccer 6 Pack DVD Set

For some soccer coaches this program might seem familiar. But our program found some hidden gems with some good quality soccer drills. Youth soccer programs that make practices a priority in their league will find this very useful. Soccer Coaching:Championship Soccer Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review. Soccer Training:Backyard Soccer Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review. Soccer Coaching:Soccer Shooting Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review.

ADVANCED SOCCER DRILLS is a great addition for
coaches who value quality organized practices.
In a long line of videos from the same producer,
this soccer DVD works!

As a second year soccer coach, I followed the drills in this video and our practices were much better than my first year.
The kids were stimulated and were not bored throughout these upbeat drills.
Parents who observed these drills also made a lot of positive comments.
DEFINITELY A FIVE STAR VIDEO!

An excellent compilation of soccer drills for the experienced players. Coaches will find the drills in this DVD very useful. Appropriate for intermediate and advanced players 10-18.
A WONDERFUL SOCCER PROGRAM!

This video is appropriate for school soccer teams, travel soccer
teams as well as some polished recreational teams. The program
includes numerous drills and techniques that players can work at
to excel in different soccer skills. The production values are
excellent accompanied by some great narration with explanations.
STRONGLY RECOMMENDED FOR SERIOUS SOCCER PARTICIPANTS!

This DVD was a breath of fresh air to my soccer coaching career. One of the few soccer resources that goes into depth with many of the most underrated aspects of soccer addressing them with great advanced drills. This video (DVD) goes above and beyond the basics. The production values are excellent! The brilliance of this program is the simplicity in the explanations and the quantity of relevant soccer drills that are shown. If you coach soccer from the youth level all the way up to competitive travel teams, you will love this program.
A MUST FOR ANY SOCCER COACHES RESOURCE LIBRARY! A SCORE!
